title: Jim Comey Disgraces Himself on Cable News (Ep 1136)
description:
In this episode, I address the disgraceful performance by Jim Comey this weekend in his interview with Fox News. I debunk his numerous lies and misrepresentations. I also discuss Adam Schiff’s outrageous comments in a Fox News appearance this weekend. News Picks:Flashback: Every media hack who defended the dossier.

 

Don’t miss my weekend interview with Candace Owens.

 

The IG report reveals the existence of a preciously unknown investigation of Steele’s sources. 

 

My appearance on Fox & Friends this morning where I expose Jim Comey for the fraud he is.

 

Boo hoo. Staffers for this congressman have the sads now that he’s planning on becoming a Republican.

 

Democrats start another fake outrage campaign about “coordination” and then get called out for doing the same thing. 

 

Jim Comey is refusing to reinstate his security clearance in an effort to avoid having to tell the truth.

 

Welfare is killing the American dream. 

 

Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
